title: Whats up with the long black screen I get when I do blind pick?
body: Every time I do blind picked, I accept the q and when it goes through, it takes literally 6-7 seconds for me to lad in and call my lane, which by then, all of the lanes have already been called and I'm pretty much fill. I just had to dodge a queue. Draft is great and all but sometimes I just want an opponent every now and then who doesn't have their browser open searching for champion counters lol (in the case that I'm first pick).

replies.body: The black screen is mostly caused by network problems failing to connect to the game server, so it can't download any assets.  Being out of sync in champion select further affirms that you are having some kind of network issue failing to hold communication.  I suggest going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and get things fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
